author: cmpilato
msg: Add --quiet support to the C test framework.
(do_test_num): When in quiet mode, don't print unexpected results.
(main): Parse the --quiet option, failing if it is provided

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix a SEGFAULT in the C test framework.
(svn_test__validate_tree): Catch and clear a returned error to keep
from triggering assertions that check for such things.

author: epg
msg: Follow-up to r26790: Update log --xml schema.
Define new <revprops> element, using <property> from common.rnc.

author: dlr
msg: Promote IS_COMMITTABLE() from macro to inline function for some type
